mapper.insert: insert into art_market_db.alerts(member_id, alert_writer, alert_identity, alert_type, alert_path) values(#{memberId},#{alertWriter},#{alertIdentity},#{alertType},#{alertPath})
mapper.select: select * from art_market_db.alerts where alert_path = #{alertPath} and alert_status = false
